name: Welcome to Lima Historic Centre !!!
description:
Lima is 480 years
of Traditional and History. The tourist can enjoy many tourist attractions in
the Lima Historic Center. It is possible to find many stores for tourists
where they find Handcrafts. Lima’s Main Square is the Cathedral of Lima, The
Government Place in downtown Lima, The Municipality of Lima, and it can also  be found many museums,  Churches, and others.
 It is a perfect place for new experience or go on adventures we can all
take part in.
